question:
A national workshop on CPGRAMS was conducted by the centre in November. In this context, consider the following statements about CPGRAMS:
  1. It is a grievance redressal system to address issues with only the central government.
  2. The Idea Box on the DARPG website is to receive suggestions on the management of the CPGRAMS.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Â Statement 1 is incorrect: The CPGRAMS is a public redressal system launched by the Department of Administrative Reforms & Public Grievances. It receives grievances and complaints to both the central and state governments. It was created in 2007 and will take grievances to all ministers of various departments. Statement 2 is correct: An Idea Box was launched on the DARPG website to receive suggestions and ideas on the management of CPGRAMS. It was develop in collaboration with MyGov. The Prime Minister holds the top post in public grievance redressal.
